content:
Sure, here are some beginner-friendly surfing spots in Australia:

1. Byron Bay, New South Wales
2. Bondi Beach, New South Wales
3. Noosa Heads, Queensland
4. Torquay, Victoria
5. Cottesloe Beach, Western Australia
6. Surfers Paradise, Queensland 

These spots offer waves that are not too intimidating and have surf schools and instructors to guide beginners. Make sure to check the current conditions and surf safety guidelines, and use proper surfing equipment and protective gear. Enjoy your surfing experience!
